name: CLP_PRTL_RESUB_DMD
description: This table stores claim partial resubmit/demand information.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: UB_TCN
columns.description: Stores uniform billing line control number.

columns.name: ORIG_UB_LN
columns.description: Stores original line number for partial uniform billing line.
